description: This PHP script handles setting QoS (Quality of Service) configurations for network devices such as WiFi Access Points and MoCA interfaces. It performs session validation, retrieves QoS parameters from a request, and applies settings via external system calls.

methods.name: session_start
methods.description: Starts a new session or resumes an existing one.

methods.name: json_decode
methods.description: Decodes a JSON string into a PHP variable.

methods.name: explode
methods.description: Splits a string by a string delimiter.

methods.name: getInstanceIDs
methods.description: Retrieves instance IDs for a specified device type.

methods.name: setStr
methods.description: Sets a configuration string for a device parameter.
